sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of ju 疽 , impediment - illnesses, with nodular swelling and deep-reaching pain where the erosion of tissue and festering slowly progress and the prognosis is inauspicious. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 33: 以其結腫積久，而肉腐壞遲，故名緩疽 , “As its nodular swelling collects over an extended period of time, and because the flesh rots away completely one calls this ‘ chronic progressive impediment-illness ’”.
